title: Bus Transportation Facility
content:
So guys had pes round 1 counselling.  
So i live in electronic city and i chose cse ec today, but almost immediately regretted my choice of not choosing pes rr. I asked the ceo person giving speech and he told i could change my choice to pes rr in second round counselling. The thing I want to ask is whether pes has bus facility from electronic city to rr campus. If some senior could enlighten me on this topic, it'll be really helpful! Thanks!

comments.body: If you don't mind can you tell me your jee main percentile and corresponding PESU rank
Hey i live in electronic City too and I asked about transportation , he told me there's no buses coming from electronic City
Are you sure about that? I asked the lady doing registration and she told me yes bus does come to ec, but it did feel like she just said that so i could hurry, lol
Ye pretty sure although do ask again ig and lemme know if they say yes

[bus route link](https://pes.edu/admissions/transportation/) , hope this helps.  
also if your travel time is around 1 to 2 hours , better to choose ecc , wont be missing out on much.
why do u regret your decision tho?

Thanks! was really helpful!  
Yeah as i thought all the stops are too far away
Since like everyone above me choose rr cse,  i was like 2nd or 3rd one to chose ec
look at the faq's both the campuses are practically the same, the only reason i chose rr is cuz i live kinda close to rr campus
What's in RR that's not there in ecity
